name: Flip
headline: Community-driven marketplace for sneakers.
description: FLIP is everyone’s sneaker connect — the premier specialty destination where people find and sell hard to find, rare, limited edition sneakers. They have created a community where their members can buy and sell with confidence and ease. Never miss out on an opportunity to place your bid on hard to find sneakers in 90 minutes from a curated list of quality sellers who really care. Their mobile only platform is currently available for your iPhone and coming soon to Android. They strive to keep an open and trusted environment for their community.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Flip**

**Mission:** Flip aims to be the ultimate community-driven marketplace for sneakers, connecting enthusiasts with hard-to-find, rare, and limited-edition sneakers.

**Foundation and Background:** Founded in 2014 and part of Y Combinator's Winter 2015 batch, Flip has emerged as a significant player in the sneaker marketplace scene. Based in Los Angeles, CA, the company seeks to cultivate an environment where its community can buy and sell with confidence and ease.

**Platform Features:**
- **Sneaker Auctions:** Flip distinguishes itself with super-fast, authentic sneaker auctions. Members can place bids on curated lists of quality sellers within 90 minutes, ensuring they never miss out on coveted footwear.
- **Guaranteed Sales:** If an approved item doesn't sell, Flip steps in to buy it—eliminating hassle for sellers and boosting trust within the community.
- **Buyer Control:** The platform allows buyers to set their own prices, all handled seamlessly through the app.

**Technology and Accessibility:** Currently a mobile-only platform for iPhone users, Flip is set to expand to Android soon. The emphasis on mobile accessibility encourages a vibrant community engagement, allowing users to get instant notifications on sneaker availability.

**Community and Engagement:** With an open, trusted environment, Flip has created a dedicated community of sneaker lovers who are both buyers and sellers. There’s a robustness in how they ensure that quality is maintained, establishing a level of authenticity and security.

**Future Outlook:** As sneakers continue to be a trending collectible and fashion statement, Flip is well-positioned to grow as a go-to marketplace in this emerging niche. Their focus on user experience, trusted transactions, and community involvement makes them a compelling player in the e-commerce landscape.

**Follow Them:**
Keep up with Flip on their social media channels:
- [Facebook](http://justflip.com/<https:/www.facebook.com/justflipit>)
- [Twitter](http://justflip.com/<https:/twitter.com/JustFlip>)
- [Instagram](http://justflip.com/<https:/instagram.com/justflip/>)

**Website:** For more information, check out [justflip.com](http://justflip.com).

In a nutshell, Flip is taking the sneaker selling game to a new level—if you're into sneakers, it's worth your time to get involved.
